snippet.title: Nod vs Blackhand: Trailer
snippet.description:
What was once a community made mod for Renegade X is now part of the base game!

Nod vs Blackhand features a mirrored symmetrical faction setup whilst also expanding the Nod arsenal to include Recon Bikes and M2 Bradley tanks as purchasable vehicles.


https://ren-x.com/
https://www.facebook.com/RenXFirestorm
https://discord.com/invite/renegadex

Join us on Discord! We hold PUGs (Pick Up Games) every weekend at 6:00pm GMT or 2:00pm EDT
